synopsis.text:
Embedded in the monotony of a mundane life, an unassuming office worker named Johnson finds himself yearning for a thrilling escape. His wish is granted when he stumbles upon the TM Corporation, a company that specializes in selling virtual dreams. However, this isn't just any dream; it's a revelation of Johnson's forgotten past as Cobra, the notorious space pirate.

Equipped with the Psychogun, a formidable weapon powered by his own will, Cobra navigates the cosmos alongside his android companion, Lady Armaroid. Their adventures are a thrilling cocktail of high-stakes heists, daring prison escapes, and encounters with the galaxy's most feared adversaries. Cobra's fame is a double-edged sword, attracting both admiration and danger, leading him to alter his appearance and erase his memories to live a "normal" life.

However, the echoes of his past refuse to fade away. As fragments of his memory resurface, Cobra finds himself drawn back into his old life. He crosses paths with Vaiken, a high-ranking member of the Pirate Guild, an organization that Cobra had once opposed. This encounter reignites his latent memories and reactivates the Psychogun, setting the stage for a renewed conflict with the Guild.

Cobra's journey is not just a quest for power and wealth but also a search for his lost identity. As he traverses the galaxy, he confronts various challenges, from hunting for the ultimate weapon to uncovering drug trafficking operations disguised within a brutal sport. All the while, he maintains his charm, humor, and an insatiable appetite for adventure.

Join Cobra and Lady Armaroid as they navigate a universe filled with danger, deception, and excitement
